body.p:
To His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky:

The undersigned Citizens of Mason Co. Ky., would respectfully represent unto Your Excellency, that at a trial, on behalf of the Commonwealth vs George W. Horton for a breach of the peace, had before Charles J. Fox, a Justice of the peace for sd County, on the 20th day of Septr 1860, Said Horton was fined the sum of nine dollars; which fine your petitioners believe was unjust and improperly imposed.
They therefore respectfully petition Your Excellency to remit the same.
